description.p:
This is support for the abb_irb1200 using the abb_driver found "https://github.com/ros-industrial/abb" It is based upon other versions of ABB irb robotic arms Values used for building the models included are based upon datasheets provided by ABB. User should beware and double check model and values match.
NOTE: THIS VERSION IS BASED ON THE ABB IRB 1200-7/0.7 VERSION!
